storyInfo: An ardent, unknown Abyssal person has entered Specter onto a list for a Christmas gift exchange. Suzuran draws Specter as her recipient, and while being unable to meet with her, tries to give her feelings form all the same.

attributes.content: Come in.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Nice to meet you, I'm Operator Suzuran...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Yo, Aosta! We're back!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Get out.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Huh?! I'm so sorry to bother you, I'll leave you alone right now...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Not you. I mean this noisy son of a mother.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: He'll run his mouth with all sorts of things you just shouldn't be hearing, so we stop him before he gets the chance.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Hey, what, is that how you figure me? I was just pumped to bring Little Miss Suzuran to you here, see, she said she wanted you to make some cursed doll for Christmas...
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: A 'Specter doll.'
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Yeah, get it? That's gonna be real simple, right, Aosta? Needling that stuff's your number one thing.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: She was looking for our room for a while, y'know. Just throw that together and give it to her, yeah?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: It's not that simple, you single-celled organism.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: I'm sorry to have disturbed you...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Whatever. It's not like I'm turning you right down.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: So, what exactly is it you want me to make?
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: I actually saw your name in the list of custom Christmas present makers. I was hoping you could help make a doll for a 'Christmas Party' gift exchange.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: A gift exchange, huh.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Yes! We all pulled lots to decide our recipients.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: I drew Operator Specter, so I thought of making a nice, ordinary 'Specter' doll to match their personality.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Whoaaa, that's easy as hell! Aosta, c'mon, who put a stick up your ass? Quit scrunching your face up, what's not to get about this?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: ...Is that all, Suzuran?
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Yes! I can pay for you and your materials out of my own pocket!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Then you know the rules, don't you?
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: (Tense) I-I understand!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Huh? What's the big deal now? Why so nervous, Suzurina?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: I take orders based on mood.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: My commission sheet noted 'I only accept one order per Christmas' on the back.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: *Clicks tongue* You're like one of those 'scumbag grown-up' types from the movies. What's your terms and conditions like? If it sounds too hard, you're just not gonna?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Any tailored product is easy enough, as far as I'm concerned. If it doesn't require any special Originium processing or materials, I can get it done in a trivial amount of time.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: So... Suzuran, about your request...
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Gwuh...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: —I accept it.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Th-That's great!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: (Your rule's just accepting the first guy who comes your way with an order, I bet.)
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: (Hmph.)
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Cool, everything's sorted! Now—
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: I'm not finished. The question we have to answer now is the 'plan' itself.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Plan? What else do you even need? Just follow what Suzurina asked for and make something, and you'll be fine.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: *sigh*... Chiave, you should get into carrying a mirror. See how stupid you look playing the clown.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Who asked you to ramble so much? I don't understand why you brainy guys always talk like you're covering up. Where the hell's the problem?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Let me make this clear: I'm not being intentionally difficult.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Suzuran, you're sure you want me to make you a doll for Operator Specter, as a gift?
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Yes!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: In that case, your design?
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: A rough sort of hand sketch works, a detailed written description works, or the most direct path, a photo of this Operator 'Specter.' You haven't given me anything, have you?
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: ...Uh... um... I haven't.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Huh? So you mean...?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Chiave, you dumbass. That's what I'm saying. Approach everything with a little more thought, and you'll find your problem faster, no matter in normal life or during critical moments.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: This 'Christmas gift exchange' doesn't interest us, so we haven't kept on top of it.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: But Suzuran, you wouldn't know which participant you're gifting to beforehand either.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: The problem is, whether me or Chiave, we've never even heard of anything this Operator 'Specter' has done before.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: We haven't seen them in the cafeteria, the gym, or on any sort of mission, either.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: You've got a keen eye though. Any doll you have me make will blow any pile of pretty handmade gifts out of the water.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Right now, the most important piece of information we're missing is—just who is your recipient, this Operator called Specter? What do they look like?
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Ha ha, c'mon, Little Miss, don't get bummed out. Aosta just talks kind of direct, that's all. He's not saying he's gonna refuse your request.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: More likely if you try to find anyone else to make your present, he'll bring his 'weapons' out and go fight the other tailor for supremacy, then come back and cross his heart to get what you asked done.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: I'm sorry, Chiave, it's my fault for rushing too fast to call on you, when I clearly don't know enough yet about who I'm even giving this gift to.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: I gotta say, it's a pretty weird game when someone you know nothing about's signed up.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Hehe. That must be a large part of the reason this game exists. It encourages everyone to know each other better.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: But actually, I assumed I was the only one in the dark on Operator 'Specter.' I never thought nobody else knew...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Damn, that's weird! Don't be shocked, but I don't think I can help you out with this!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Hey, but it works out this way too. You work hard, go around asking everyone about 'Specter,' and you know all sorts of people better by the end of it.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: —Just so long as it's not someone you should be steering clear of.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: The people taking part in this thing can't be that dangerous, right?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: I-I don't think so.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Ha ha, thought so too. Sounds like an average party game to me.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Go ask and see, then, Suzuran!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Rhodes Island is so full of mystery guys, you have no idea. You don't know if they're just like the name, mysterious like a 'specter,' terrifying to see, voice deep and dark all around you at night...
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Eek...!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: E-Even so, they're my recipient, so I'll try my hardest... to give them this present!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Yeah, I like that attitude.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Careful out there, Suzuran. You land in any hot water, just give me or Aosta a shout—
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: If there's one thing we know, it's problem-busting.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Hm... I need to think, what should I do now...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Chiave and Aosta's worries aren't unreasonable. After all, I've never heard anything about Operator 'Specter' before, and I haven't ever seen them either...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: But Ifrit invited me to do this, and Silence helped set it up. There shouldn't be anyone to watch out for.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: But because I don't recognize them, I don't know who I can ask, either...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Mgh... I can't be pessimistic! No matter who they are, I joined in so I could share the holiday cheer, and experience the effort that goes into getting gifts, and the nice surprise of receiving them.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: I'm looking forward to being part of all sorts of holidays, and getting all sorts of gifts... and they must be looking forward to it with great care, too.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: I can find information for sure. Everyone is always praising the dolls Aosta makes. I have to do my best too, to give them a gift that'll make them happy.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Alright. Let's work on finding any relevant information about Operator Specter today.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Half an hour later...
E... Excuse me...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Um... May I ask...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Hm? If it isn't Suzuran. What's...
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: Calm down, I'll hear out what you want to say. What's happened?
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: (Suzuran doesn't usually look so frazzled... Could something serious have happened?)
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: I-I want to... find someone... Meteorite, do you know Operator 'Specter?'
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Specter... is it...?
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: Because... Because I asked some friends, and nobody knows of any 'Specter' at all, so I thought I might've come across... something strange.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Phew... So that's how it is.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: It's alright, don't be scared. Good girl. You haven't run into anything too bad just yet.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: It's true, 'Specter' is a very exclusively kept secret, but she's one among Rhodes Island's personnel as well.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: True indeed... I don't believe she and any of your friends would've ever come across each other.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: But you have to tell me, why are you seeking information on her?
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: I-I wanted to give her a present...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Present? But you hardly even knew she existed.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: Ah, let me think... It was the one on the pamphlet, the Christmas party with the gift exchange of some sort. Is that what led you to look for her?
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: Yes! Could it be... you're in the exchange too?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: I am. We're both getting presents ready right now. Alright—there's no need for alarm, then. I may know a few things or other regarding this operator.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: But why are you the only one who knows anything about Specter so far?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: I've been searching so hard...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: You're very diligent, Suzuran.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: But here at Rhodes Island, there are more than a few people who have to hide themselves.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: I only know of Specter because we once fought alongside each other.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: But you're always on such difficult, dangerous missions...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Though it's a reluctant thing, to Rhodes Island, people like me who can 'cut through to the chase' are indispensable.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: It's easier on myself, as well. After all, going on safe, secure work would've actually dulled me.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: That said, as a 'chase-cutter,' Specter is certainly much sharper than I am.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: Do you know... what kind of person Specter is?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: We only worked together once.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: She's a young woman from the deep sea. A presence whose mind is a bit of a challenge to comprehend for the rest of us.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: Huh...?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Unable to carry out tactical communication. She takes up her weapon, hears an order, and then heed only that sole commander's orders until the mission is over and done with.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: Is Specter... a very quiet person?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: If you call not uttering a single word 'quiet.'
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: But silence is far from just an affectation, it is also a choice.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: When she sees terrifying, murderous enemies before us, and monsters who roar as they charge us, she preserves that 'quiet' way of hers unbroken, with her mood completely unreadable.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: After that... she wreaks her most unwavering destruction, as if from start to end she believes that she, on her own, is facing off against every single threat.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: I imagine that, aside from listening to her commander's orders, she gives not one care for her own body.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: Whether enemy or ally, alive or dead, she sees none of the emotional fluctuation between anything or anyone in her surroundings.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: Yet, I wonder if her wordless self is ultimately aware of how she 'holds her peace,' and whether she hopes to communicate with others.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: Th... Then, setting battle aside, would Specter have any relation to anyone else?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Now that's a difficult question... but, and I imagine, Specter's psychological state is far from suited to a normal life.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: At the very least... I can't picture her dwelling ordinarily in the dormitories.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: Then that means... maybe the Medical team has more...?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Ah! I get it.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Uh-huh. Now, I absolutely didn't just mention any significance-bearing clue.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: Hehe, thank you, Meteorite. If we get another chance, I'd like to hear you share more of your war stories.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: If conflict is unavoidable, if our only option to protect them is to fight... I hope I can protect the friends and family I hold dear too.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Hm? You want more war stories...? I'd need to spend some time to prepare for that.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: But, if I were to guess, it'd be very difficult for me to ever cooperate with Specter on another mission.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: After we left the mission zone, and until we were back at Rhodes Island to recuperate, the sight of her weightlessly, methodically tearing our enemies to shreds played back in my mind.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: Her mind could only be barren, or else hold secrets dangerous enough to outweigh those atrocities.
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: Otherwise, how could she be so indifferent to the result of what she does with her own hands?
attributes.name: Meteorite

attributes.content: Right—come in.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Sorry to bother you—
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Huh? Here at my clinic of your own accord, Suzuran? You wanted the same no-holds-barred health checkup as always, then?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: No! Nothing that scary, Folinic.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Just messing with you. I'm on break right now; if you want to play something with me, I'm all ears.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: So. What's on your mind?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Actually, I'm preparing a Christmas present for a gift exchange.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Mmhm, mmhm.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: And also, my partner for the exchange is Specter.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Mmhm... mm? Did you say Specter?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Wait, she shouldn't have left the med bay recently. How could she...
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Ah... so you do know something about Specter.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: That's brilliant. I was afraid I figured it wrong.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: I-I'm giving Specter a handmade memento doll, so I want to know some things about her.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Info about Specter... huh.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: I can confirm I've assisted Dr. Kal'tsit in treating her before.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: But her mental state has been overly unstable as of recent. A while's already passed without her leaving her treatment room.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Did she really sign up to a gift exchange?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: I-I think anyone has the right to enter it.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: But Meteorite said that Specter wouldn't take part in a game like this, too. Maybe... maybe somebody helped her sign up?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: But no matter what, I'm not going to mess this up!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: That's for sure. You're a goody-two-shoes, Suzuran.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: By my guess, there's only the ones who visit her that... ahem, no, forget it, nothing.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Is Specter very ill, and unable to leave?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: During her very few moments of lucidity, Specter might choose to head outside for a bit.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: But her language systems have been greatly affected, and rather than saying anything someone might misconstrue, she chooses to be silent most of the time.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Hm... on the battlefield, she displays calm behavior exhibited through past muscle memory, and after her fill of combat, her period of over-fatigue allows her to soundly rest.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: So don't worry too much. Specter leads her lifestyle in the manners she's able to choose.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: If that's true, I want to see her...!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: That's...
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: So I can't, after all...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Even I can't enter from her room at will, most of the time.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: I understand you want to give your gift to her in person, but given Specter's current condition, that may be extremely difficult.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Hm.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: But I just hope... even if I can't meet her, I can at least finish this present, and have it reach her hands.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: I think there's a lot of meaning in giving and receiving gifts!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: That's really, really great. Good on you, Suzuran. Make sure you hold onto that kind heart!
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: (Whisper) Actually, as long as the info's not too sensitive, it's not like I can't make an exception for you.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Hehe. Who made me Kal'tsit's trusted disciple?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Thank you, Folinic...! If it's okay, I want to gather any design elements I can use to make the souvenir Specter doll...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Yoohoo!
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Well now, if it isn't little Suzuran?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Is Specter your topic of the day?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Ah, Dr. Warfarin.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Damn, it's her. Here we go...
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Just overheard while I was passing by the door, that is all. You want to make a doll of Specter, do you?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Now isn't that such a cute notion! I'll help!
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Even that couldn't escape your eavesdropping, Dr. Warfarin.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Honestly, I could give you her measurements: bust, waist, AND hips. Plus the precise material used in her clothes... my access far outstrips Dr. Folinic's here.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Y-You really know all those details...?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: More than that, I could also help get your doll into Specter's hands.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Of course, my price... heh, heh, you peddling Penguin Logistician, I'll have that commemorative run of tomato juice out of your mitts yet...
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: I-I understand, I'll go right now and ask—
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Don't make lackeys out of children, Dr. Warfarin!
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Ah, Suzuran! You don't need to go right now—
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Good, then! Our business is thus concluded!
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Huh? What... do you mean?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Wasn't that a very dangerous spot you were just in? I don't think allowing Suzuran to know the present truth of things vis-a-vis Specter is any good idea.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: She cares, that's all. She's a smart girl, and knows there are many things she shouldn't come to understand, nor need to be aware of.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Just a little curiosity can put one in an irreversibly sticky situation. It's a very well-worn warning.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Even so, I wonder what warm heart thought to offer Specter a little extra kindness—
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: I imagine they set Suzuran up to give the gift as well.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Quite. After all, anyone else raising Specter topics with no warning would raise some very clear-cut red flags.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: And only Suzuran could make us, or anyone, believe this was genuine passion and concern.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Specter wouldn't be familiar with this, the holiday gift exchange... and has no way of preparing in time.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Do you feel sorry for Suzuran?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: I'm just...
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: To be clear, I didn't say what I just said for the fun of it.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Come the time, I'll have Suzuran give the sewn-up present over to me, and I'll think of some way to have Specter receive it.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: But if we allow Dr. Kal'tsit to find out about this—
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Didn't you just say? For Suzuran's sake, you wouldn't balk at using a little 'tiny bit of prerogative.'
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: To be factual, it's for Specter's sake as well.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: How will she respond when she receives this gift...? That should have some experimental value, no?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: But still... I have this feeling, the one apologizing to Dr. Kal'tsit in the end's going to be me!
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Well, it certainly won't be me—
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Twenty days later...
Mmn...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: (Yawn—)
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: It's already morning. My coat... phew, alright!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Today I need to go to Folinic's for a health checkup, I need to find Kal'tsit for tutoring... ah, and there's a tea party and a tailoring expert giving lessons this afternoon. I need to keep my spirits up all day.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: If I start learning how to sew in earnest now, maybe one day I could become just like Aosta, able to make presents everyone will love.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Hehe. I've already given Dr. Warfarin the doll I asked him to make so she could pass it on to Specter for Christmas.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Dr. Warfarin said Specter probably doesn't know who signed her up to the gift exchange, but when she got her present, her state seemed to improve a bit.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Ah, Christmas was already six days ago... it was so much fun, I'm still giddy even now.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: I hope Specter got to enjoy some Christmasy feeling too.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: After she gets better, I wonder if we'll have the chance to chat, and eat together, hehe...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Alright, I need my schoolbag, schoolbag...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: What's this gift box on the table...? This wasn't here last night, was it?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: C-Could it be there were too many people to give gifts to, and Father Christmas missed a gift by mistake—
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Wow.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: This is...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: 'A present from the abyssal deep sea'...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: It's a music box!
attributes.name: Suzuran
